description:
**Fix Overview**:

To mitigate the remote code execution vulnerability in Windows Routing and Remote Access Service (RRAS) described in CVE-2024-30024, perform the following steps:

1. Download and apply the necessary updates that address this vulnerability via the links provided below.
2. Restart your system to ensure proper application of the updates.

**Details**:
- Multiple updates are available for different Windows build numbers, including:
  - For Windows 11 Version 23H2, apply KB5037771
  - For Windows 10 Version 22H2 for x64-based systems, apply KB5037768
  - Ensure your system is on a supported version by verifying your build number against the context above.
- Visit the following links to access the updates:
  - [KB5037788](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5037788)
  - [KB5037770](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5037770)
  - [KB5037768](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5037768)
  - [KB5037771](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5037771)

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure that your system is running one of the specified Windows versions.
- Backup critical data before proceeding with the updates.
